metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5560 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.232 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.508 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 18.0.0.199, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.199, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 18.0.0.199 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5560` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1').
